data.title: Work with experienced colleagues from Oracle, IBM, Microsoft, SAP...
data.content:
The Role Veeva China SFA is a world-class CRM product designed for life sciences in Chinese market.

As a product designer in China SFA team, you will be responsible for designing user interface of the product and improve user experiences when using the product.

Work together with other product designers in the team to design the user interface and user interaction of China SFA product.
